attributes.action: Build public bomb shelters and provide funding for people to build their own
attributes.additional_details: We believe the taxpayer doesn't have enough of a say in where the tax money gets spent, and a lot of that money gets spent on the military and conflicts in foreign nations. We want some of that money to come back to us in the way of protection from attack from other nations. The Swiss agreed to this after the last World War, we would like this to happen in case there is another one.
attributes.background: We think the Government should help us protect ourselves from the risk of attack. In the 1960s Switzerland started to build the world's largest system of defence shelters. As war escalates, we want the same protection. Build public bomb shelters and provide funding for people to build their own.
